Name: Save the Planet
About the game: The player will have to defend their planet from alien attacks by repelling their projectiles using an orbital platform. Passing new and more powerful levels of enemies, your platform will be available to various types of firearms improvements that can effectively hit the aliens. Collect points, upgrade your weapon, complete levels and compete with your friends in the online highscore table, become the best! And for fans of complexity, the 'crazy mode' is available, where it is very difficult to control the orbital platform, but very fun and funny. I wonder if you can reach level 10 in this mode? Key game features: Over 20 types of aliens with different characteristics and features will not let you get bored. More than 5 types of weapons to improve the platform with different actions and power to protect the planet more effectively. More than 10 types of bonuses (from additional health to the planet to the simultaneous explosion of all aliens on the location). About 20 Steam achievements, take them all! Other features: An infinite number of waves of opponents, it all depends on your skill 3 types of bosses to reach certain waves Insane difficulty level with heavy controls Online high score table Controller support
